name: Wrathful Smite
description: The next time you hit with a melee weapon attack during this spell's duration, your attack deals an extra 1d6 Psychic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be Frightened of you until the spell ends. A Frightened creature can use its action to make a Wisdom check against your spell save DC, ending the spell on a success.

effects.description: On a failed save, the target is Frightened until the spell ends; it can use its action to make a Wisdom check against your spell save DC, ending the effect on a success.
